section.title: Introduction
section.p: Publets are packages providing a certain set of resources or functionality.

ul.li: a collection of XSLTs (e.g., content2svg publet)

section.p: Some publets are included in the Lenya distribution:

ul.li: sitetree - manage documents in a tree-like structure
jcr - store content in a JCR repository
links - resource type to manage link lists

section.title: Implementing a Publet
section.p: All resources of a publet are located in a single directory. The following is an example directory structure, all files are optional and depend on the nature of the publet.
section.source: mypublet/ config/ configuration files components.xconf patch for cocoon.xconf usecases/ mypublet.jx usecase view java/ src/ Java source files lib/ Java libraries xslt/ XSLT stylesheets sitemap.xmap main publet sitemap
section.p: When the publet is deployed, the following steps are executed:

ul.li: the publet files are copied to context://lenya/publets
Java sources are compiled, libraries are installed
